theme_reveal.headline: Finance
theme_reveal.body: Foundational terms for money, markets, and business finance.

entries.clue: A plan that estimates income and expenses over a period
Money owed by a person or company that must be repaid
Ownership shares in a company, also called equities
A pool of investments managed together; often abbreviated ETF or mutual
The increase in value of an investment over time
Diversifying by spreading investments across different assets
